thread.section_title: Amalfi Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!!!
thread.title_full: Excellent!!! - Review of Amalfi Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: torresdjalberto
title: Excellent!!!
text:
My wife and I were on this hotel in the last moment, because we had a issue with our original reservation in other hotel, and this hotel was excellent in all the words, service, location, price. We were very happy on this hotel. It is very near walking of Termini Station where you can buy a ticket of direct bus to the airports in Rome.
Thanks.
Room Tip: Location, Excellent See more room tips
